I’m Nick Niles,
an American designer / art director / web developer / musician and founder of Pastiche GmbH in Zürich, Switzerland. 

A former rock musician and long-distance runner, I’ve been serving a wide range of clients since 1998. With an MFA in Film Directing from Columbia I enjoy creating rich experiences through motion graphics, animations, and interaction design.

I’m especially interested in the power of high-fidelity interactive prototypes to help teams save time and money.

Areas of Expertise

  • Videos and films (animated & live-action) designed to explain, excite and pitch
  • Music composition
  • High-fidelity coded prototypes of digital features & apps
  • Branding & identity design for small-to-medium businesses, startups and campaigns
  • Design & development of corporate & campaign websites

Select Clients

  • Google
  • Coca-Cola
  • Samsung
  • Hilton Hotels
  • Swiss Airlines
  • Zürich University of the Arts (ZHdK)
  • Kanton Zürich

Skills

  • Graphic & Interactive Design

More info

I live with my wife and son in Zürich, where my music has grown folkier and my long runs shorter. Get in touch: nick@nickniles.com
